content: * materials assorted leftover sock yarn * size 105cm 42″ x 140cm 56″ consisting of 165 squares 11 x 15 * each mitred square weighs 6g and measures 9 5cm x 9 5cm 3 75″ x 3 75″ * needles two 3 25mm us 3 20cm 8″ long double pointed needles * other notions used a locking stitch marker or safety pin and a stitch marker
